sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import '../styles/profile.css'; const Profile = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('posts'); useEffect(() => { const currentUser = localStorage.getItem('currentUser'); if (currentUser) { setUser(JSON.parse(currentUser)); } }, []); const userPosts = [ { id: 1, content: 'Just finished my latest project! Excited to share the results.', time: '2 hours ago', likes: 15, comments: 8 }, { id: 2, content: 'Great day at the university today. Learning new things every day!', time: '1 day ago', likes: 23, comments: 12 } ]; const userStats = { posts: 45, followers: 234, following: 156, likes: 1234 }; if (!user) { return
Loading profile...
; } return (

{user.firstName} {user.lastName}

@{user.username}

Student at University • {user.department}

{userStats.posts} Posts
{userStats.followers} Followers
{userStats.following} Following
{activeTab === 'posts' && (
{userPosts.map((post) => (

{post.content}

{post.time}
{post.likes} {post.comments}
))}
)} {activeTab === 'about' && (

Personal Information

Full Name: {user.firstName} {user.lastName}
Email: {user.email}
Phone: {user.phone || 'Not provided'}
User Type: {user.userType}
Department: {user.department}
{user.semester && (
Semester: {user.semester}
)} {user.joiningYear && (
Joining Year: {user.joiningYear}
)} {user.graduationYear && (
Graduation Year: {user.graduationYear}
)}
)} {activeTab === 'friends' && (

John Doe

Computer Science

Jane Smith

Electrical Engineering

Mike Johnson

Mechanical Engineering

)}
); }; export default Profile;
